product_name: Friday Harbor Adventure Tandem Inflatable Kayak
long_description: You'll have a blast with the Friday Harbor Adventure tandem inflatable kayak. Pack it in to your favorite area, inflate, hit the water and forget your worries. Suitable for paddling on lakes, mild rivers, bays and estuaries. Durable, heavy-gauge PVC provides superb puncture resistance; 7 chambers of inflation with an I-beam floor create a responsive watercraft. 600-denier polyester decking ensures a long life for the kayak and protects paddlers from drips. Removable tracking fin improves handling. Adjustable high-back seats promote comfort; kayak can be paddled solo from the forward seat. Bungee deck lacing stows gear; low-profile handles allow smooth transport to and from the water. Drain hole with plug removes excess water from your kayak; Friday Harbor Adventure kayak features Boston valves. Includes repair kit.
short_description: You'll have a blast with the Friday Harbor Adventure tandem inflatable kayak. Pack it in to your favorite area, inflate, hit the water and forget your worries.
